statements: SELECT id, heart_rate FROM vital_signs;
SELECT timestamp, temperature FROM vital_signs ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM vital_signs WHERE temperature > 98.6;
SELECT id, blood_pressure FROM vital_signs WHERE heart_rate < 60;
SELECT AVG(heart_rate), MAX(temperature) FROM vital_signs;
SELECT * FROM vital_signs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, timestamp, temperature FROM vital_signs WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT id, timestamp, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM vital_signs WHERE temperature BETWEEN 36.5 AND 37.5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM vital_signs WHERE blood_pressure LIKE '%120%';
SELECT id, timestamp, temperature FROM vital_signs WHERE heart_rate < 60 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM vital_signs_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, temperature FROM vital_signs_data WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_info WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM vital_signs_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patient_info WHERE age >= 50;
SELECT * FROM vital_signs_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patient_info WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, MAX(heart_rate) AS max_hr FROM vital_signs_data WHERE timestamp >= '2023-01-01' GROUP BY DATE(timestamp);
SELECT patient_name, gender, address FROM patient_info WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT timestamp, heart_rate, temperature FROM vital_signs_data WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND temperature BETWEEN 98.6 AND 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM vital_signs_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT measurement_id, heart_rate FROM vital_signs_data WHERE blood_pressure LIKE '%120%'
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients ORDER by patient_name ASC
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_description FROM monitoring_logs
SELECT * FROM vital_signs_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT measurement_id, timestamp, temperature FROM vital_signs_data WHERE temperature > 98.6;
SELECT patient_name, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM patients JOIN vital_signs_data ON patients.patient_id = vital_signs_data.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, log_timestamp, log_description FROM patients JOIN monitoring_logs ON patients.patient_id = monitoring_logs.measurement_id;
SELECT * FROM vital_signs_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT heart_rate FROM heart_rate_data WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT timestamp, systolic_pressure, diastolic_pressure FROM blood_pressure_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT id, temperature FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature <= 98.6 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM vital_signs_data WHERE blood_pressure = 'normal' AND timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT * FROM vital_signs_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, heart_rate FROM vital_signs_data WHERE heart_rate > 80 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, blood_pressure, temperature FROM vital_signs_data WHERE blood_pressure LIKE '%120%' ORDER BY temperature ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp, temperature FROM temperature_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 98.6 AND 100.4;
SELECT systolic_pressure, diastolic_pressure FROM blood_pressure_data WHERE systolic_pressure > 120 AND diastolic_pressure < 80 ORDER BY systolic_pressure DESC, diastolic_pressure ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM VitalSignsData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, heart_rate, blood_pressure FROM VitalSignsData WHERE heart_rate > 80 AND temperature < 98.6 ORDER BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM HeartRateHistory WHERE heart_rate > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT(patient_id) FROM BloodPressureHistory WHERE systolic_pressure > 120 AND diastolic_pressure < 80 ORDER BY patient_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, gender FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM HeartRateHistory WHERE patient_id = '1a2b3c4d5e';
SELECT timestamp, heart_rate FROM VitalSignsData WHERE patient_id = '123456';
SELECT systolic_pressure, diastolic_pressure FROM BloodPressureHistory WHERE patient_id = 'abcdef';
SELECT patient_id, MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature FROM TemperatureHistory GROUP BY patient_id;
